title: What are some tips to make a fantasy novel interesting? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, I am not really a novelist but I have written a few books for my personal interests and satisfaction. The way to make it interesting: Make it relevant - Include situations people of your target group can relate to and easily understand Add mature 'in-topics’ - Topics to do with sex, feminism, racism, drug overdoze mentioned a little, give the book some cult support and it bodes well with your audience Make the novel appeal on a level more than just the story - The character should be described and showcased such that he looks like a character talking from the book or even beyond. Add an unthought of twist - As you start writing and have reached a stage, include the most bizzare thing you can imagine. Spend a few chapters describing it. Do this much and it's a decent read. Of all that you've written it, you can always share it with me. Shall try to help you how you can make it better anf give you an honest and true review Thanks :)
